alert.note: Alert for Lenawee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 7:38PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT LENAWEE COUNTY THROUGH 845 PM EDT... At 737 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Onsted to near Adrian to 7 miles east of Morenci. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Adrian, Tecumseh, Blissfield, Morenci, Onsted, Deerfield, Britton, Clayton, Palmyra, Fairfield, Springville, Ridgeway, Macon, Riga, Seneca, Jasper, Medina, Ogden Center, Canandaigua, and Sand Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
